briefdescription.para: For given input get the input gradients when backpropagated the loss with respect to the mentioned label by user.

listitem.para: Indices : the indices corresponding to which we are returning gradients in the input vector(we only return indices if input is sparse).
gradients ratios: (gradient_value)/(input_value) , this is for normalizing the gradients.
